name: BlueFacts
0:
”Alexa open Blue facts”
”Alexa launch blue facts”
”Alexa start blue facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue facts
des:
Ask for Blue Facts, and learn about a truly extraordinary horse.

Blue Facts provides another way for us to remember Blue.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Blue Facts" or "Alexa, open Blue Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
